WorkItem.Description:
Wrong filterstring when filtering data with "is between". Same problem for date columns and columns that contains numbers.

The filter should be like:

```
(([DATUM] >= '2013-11-1' AND [DATUM] <='2013-11-8'))
```

same logic for columns that contain numbers.
WorkItem.Summary: Filtering data when is selected is between
